title: #259: Existence is Futile (@DuncanTrussell)
itunes:title: Existence is Futile with Duncan Trussell
description: Duncan Trussell invited me up to his compound in the mountains to explain to me what existentialism means. It's a heady conversation that I barely remember thanks to marijuana, but it was really interesting at the time. And it starts with a rational breakdown of the story of the Jewish holiday, Purim, in the intro.
